sqlMap.select: SELECT PROGRM_ID progrmId, PROGRM_NM progrmNm, PROGRM_DC progrmDc, FILE_PATH filePath, FILE_URL fileUrl FROM OE1TNPROGRMINFO WHERE PROGRM_ID = #progrmId#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ALL_LIST.* FROM (
/* 구현 Sql */
SELECT PROGRM_ID, PROGRM_NM, PROGRM_DC, FILE_PATH, FILE_URL FROM OE1TNPROGRMINFO WHERE 1=1
PROGRM_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
PROGRM_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY PROGRM_ID DESC /* 구현 Sql */
) ALL_LIST ) WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex# AND RNUM <= #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS totcnt FROM OE1TNPROGRMINFO WHERE 1=1
PROGRM_ID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
PROGRM_NM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
sqlMap.update: UPDATE OE1TNPROGRMINFO SET PROGRM_NM = #progrmNm# , PROGRM_DC = #progrmDc# , FILE_PATH = #filePath# , FILE_URL = #fileUrl# WHERE PROGRM_ID = #progrmId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO OE1TNPROGRMINFO ( PROGRM_ID, PROGRM_NM, PROGRM_DC, FILE_PATH, FILE_URL ) VALUES ( #progrmId#, #progrmNm#, #progrmDc#, #filePath#, #fileUrl# )
